topic.title: Improving Performance on vSphere
topic.shortdesc: This topic provides guidelines for tuning vSphere virtualized environments that host deployments.

body.p: Without tuning, can suffer a performance drop in virtual environments, including the VMware vSphere virtual platform.
You can expect to see significant performance degradation when running on vSphere versus running on dedicated hardware.
has been certified and tested on vSphere 5.0.
